summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of 7th Avenue North, in the City of Seattle, over and across that tract of land lying between the west margin of 7th Avenue North as extended across block 2, Adelle Addition to the City of Seattle, by Ordinance No. 8269, and the west margin of said block 2, Adelle Addition, as originally platted, from a point 93 feet south of the south margin of Comstock Street to the north margin of Highland Drive; and providing for the taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, and for the ascertainment and payment of the just compensation to be made for the private property to be taken or damaged for said purpose, and for an assessment upon the property benefited for the purpose of making such compensation. .
